title: Liquid Proof-of-Stake
description: In "Blockchain Basics" module, you understood the main objective of a consensus mechanism is maintaining a common history throughout the whole peer-to-peer network. There are countless consensus algorithms, and they all have pros and cons. Notably, Bitcoin's Proof-of-Work has two flaws:

frontMatter.title: Liquid Proof-of-Stake
frontMatter.authors: Thomas Zoughebi, Aymeric Bethencourt, and Maxime Fernandez
